mapper.sql: ORDER_NO, TENANT_ID, MEMBER_ID, ifnull(AMOUNT,0) "AMOUNT", ORDER_TIME, ORDER_STATUS, SERVICE_ITEM_CODE, STAFF_ID, ORDER_SOURCE, ifnull(ORDER_DEPOSIT,0) ORDER_DEPOSIT, ifnull(ORDER_BALANCE,0) "ORDER_BALANCE", DEPOSIT_DATE, IDEPOSIT_OVER, IS_INTERVIEW, PASS_VIEW_DATE, BALANCE_DATE, IS_LOCK, add_time, add_account, modify_time, modify_account, RESERVE_ORDER_NO, ORDER_TYPE, MEMBER_MOBILE, REMARK, SHARE_ORDER_NO, is_published_job, is_local_staff,user_id, BALANCE_OVER, is_usable, CANCLE_REASON,amount, service_charge, ifnull(AMOUNT,0)+ifnull(SERVICE_CHARGE,0) "TOTAL_PRICE"
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from orders
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into orders (ORDER_NO, TENANT_ID, MEMBER_ID, AMOUNT, ORDER_TIME, ORDER_STATUS, SERVICE_ITEM_CODE, STAFF_ID, ORDER_SOURCE, ORDER_DEPOSIT, ORDER_BALANCE, DEPOSIT_DATE, IDEPOSIT_OVER, IS_INTERVIEW, PASS_VIEW_DATE, BALANCE_DATE, IS_LOCK, add_time, add_account, modify_time, modify_account, RESERVE_ORDER_NO, ORDER_TYPE, MEMBER_MOBILE, REMARK, SHARE_ORDER_NO, BALANCE_OVER, is_usable, CANCLE_REASON, order_time) values (#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{depositDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{idepositOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isInterview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passViewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{balanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isLock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserveOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balanceOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cancleReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update orders
ORDER_NO = #{record.orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANT_ID = #{record.tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MEMBER_ID = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AMOUNT = #{record.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_TIME = #{record.orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORDER_STATUS = #{record.orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_ITEM_CODE = #{record.serviceItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_ID = #{record.staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORDER_SOURCE = #{record.orderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSIT = #{record.orderDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_BALANCE = #{record.orderBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSIT_DATE = #{record.depositDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IDEPOSIT_OVER = #{record.idepositOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_INTERVIEW = #{record.isInterview,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASS_VIEW_DATE = #{record.passViewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BALANCE_DATE = #{record.balanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_LOCK = #{record.isLock,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_account = #{record.addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_account = #{record.modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_ORDER_NO = #{record.reserveOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TYPE = #{record.orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_MOBILE = #{record.memberMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHARE_ORDER_NO = #{record.shareOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BALANCE_OVER = #{record.balanceOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_usable = #{record.isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CANCLE_REASON = #{record.cancleReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update orders set ORDER_NO = #{record.orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_ID = #{record.tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MEMBER_ID = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AMOUNT = #{record.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDER_TIME = #{record.orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDER_STATUS = #{record.orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_ITEM_CODE = #{record.serviceItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAFF_ID = #{record.staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDER_SOURCE = #{record.orderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_DEPOSIT = #{record.orderDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDER_BALANCE = #{record.orderBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSIT_DATE = #{record.depositDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IDEPOSIT_OVER = #{record.idepositOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_INTERVIEW = #{record.isInterview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASS_VIEW_DATE = #{record.passViewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BALANCE_DATE = #{record.balanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_LOCK = #{record.isLock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_account = #{record.addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_account = #{record.modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE_ORDER_NO = #{record.reserveOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TYPE = #{record.orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_MOBILE = #{record.memberMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_ORDER_NO = #{record.shareOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BALANCE_OVER = #{record.balanceOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_usable = #{record.isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CANCLE_REASON = #{record.cancleReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update orders
TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_TIME = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_ITEM_CODE = #{serviceItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORDER_SOURCE = #{orderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DEPOSIT = #{orderDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_BALANCE = #{orderBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSIT_DATE = #{depositDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IDEPOSIT_OVER = #{idepositOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_INTERVIEW = #{isInterview,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASS_VIEW_DATE = #{passViewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BALANCE_DATE = #{balanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_LOCK = #{isLock,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_account = #{addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_account = #{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_ORDER_NO = #{reserveOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_MOBILE = #{memberMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHARE_ORDER_NO = #{shareOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BALANCE_OVER = #{balanceOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_usable = #{isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CANCLE_REASON = #{cancleReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update orders set TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDER_TIME = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_ITEM_CODE = #{serviceItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDER_SOURCE = #{orderSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_DEPOSIT = #{orderDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDER_BALANCE = #{orderBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSIT_DATE = #{depositDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IDEPOSIT_OVER = #{idepositOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_INTERVIEW = #{isInterview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASS_VIEW_DATE = #{passViewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BALANCE_DATE = #{balanceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_LOCK = #{isLock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_account = #{addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_account = #{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE_ORDER_NO = #{reserveOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_MOBILE = #{memberMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHARE_ORDER_NO = #{shareOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BALANCE_OVER = #{balanceOver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_usable = #{isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CANCLE_REASON = #{cancleReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.ORDER_NO, a.TENANT_ID, a.MEMBER_ID, a.AMOUNT, DATE_FORMAT(a.ORDER_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') "ORDER_TIME", a.ORDER_STATUS, a.SERVICE_ITEM_CODE, a.STAFFF_SER_ITEM_ID, a.STAFF_ID, a.ORDER_SOURCE, a.ORDER_DEPOSIT, a.ORDER_BALANCE, DATE_FORMAT(a.DEPOSIT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') "DEPOSIT_DATE", a.IDEPOSIT_OVER, a.IS_INTERVIEW, DATE_FORMAT(a.PASS_VIEW_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') "PASS_VIEW_DATE", DATE_FORMAT(a.BALANCE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') "BALANCE_DATE",IS_LOCK, DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') "add_time", a.add_account, DATE_FORMAT(a.modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') "modify_time", a.modify_account, a.RESERVE_ORDER_NO, a.ORDER_TYPE, a.MEMBER_MOBILE, a.REMARK, a.CANCLE_REASON, a.SHARE_ORDER_NO, a.BALANCE_OVER, ifnull(a.SERVICE_CHARGE,0.00) "SERVICE_CHARGE", b.SERVICE_PRICE_UNIT "servicePriceUnit" from orders a , tenants_service_items b where a.ORDER_NO=#{orderNo} AND a.TENANT_ID = b.TENANT_ID AND a.SERVICE_ITEM_CODE = b.SERVICE_ITEM_CODE

select count(1) from orders where MEMBER_ID=#{memberid}
and (ORDER_STATUS = 01 or ORDER_STATUS = 03)
and ORDER_STATUS = 02
and ORDER_STATUS = 04
and ORDER_STATUS = 05
and ORDER_SOURCE != 03

select
from orders where MEMBER_ID=#{memberid}
and (ORDER_STATUS = 01 or ORDER_STATUS = 03)
and ORDER_STATUS = 02
and ORDER_STATUS = 04
and ORDER_STATUS = 05
and ORDER_SOURCE != 03 order by ORDER_TIME DESC limit #{pageNumber},#{pageSize}

select
from orders where MEMBER_ID=#{memberid}
and (ORDER_STATUS = 01 or ORDER_STATUS = 03)
and ORDER_STATUS = 02
and ORDER_STATUS = 04
and ORDER_STATUS = 05
and ORDER_SOURCE != 03 order by ORDER_TIME DESC limit #{pageNumber},#{pageSize}
mapper.update:
update orders
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CANCLE_REASON = #{cancleReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_account = #{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = now()
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
